alert.note: Alert for Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 4:40PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Vermilion County through 515 PM CDT... At 439 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Rossville, or 11 miles north of Danville, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. A gust of 49 mph was reported at Vermilion Regional Airport at 439 PM. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rossville around 450 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hoopeston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
